changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE add_withdraw ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, size DOUBLE NOT NULL, money_type ENUM ('USD', 'AMD', 'RUB') NOT NULL, status ENUM ('ADD', 'WITHDRAW') NOT NULL, date_time DATETIME NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT add_withdraw_user_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user (id) );
